mapper.select: select * from SU_QC_SOURCE_RECORD_DATA where is_mp3='txt' and owner=#{owner} and data_state in (${data_state_parames}) and score_state in (${score_state_parames})
select * from SU_QC_SOURCE_RECORD_DATA where is_mp3='txt' and owner=#{owner} and ${searchItems} and data_state in (${data_state_parames}) and score_state in (${score_state_parames})
